<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. Growing up, Ben and his sister Erin shared countless adventures, from building pillow forts to exploring the woods behind their house, forging memories that would last a lifetime.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

:Ben a :Person ;
    :name "Ben" ;
    :sex :Male ;
    :sister :Erin .

:Erin a :Person ;
    :name "Erin" ;
    :sex :Female ;
    :brother :Ben .</s>

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. If there was anything that could be said about the brother and sister, JimBob and Elizabeth, was that their sibling bond was strong.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. While JohnBoy and Mary sometimes had knock down fights, the brother and sister were each other's biggest defenders.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. JohnBoy and his sister Erin both loved to cook.  And while they both excelled at it, it was JohnBoy's sister, Erin, who excelled more at it.[/INST]@prefix : <https://know.dev/> .

<s>[INST]Translate the following user text into RDF using the : <https://know.dev/> ontology. When they were younger, both Jason and Mary shared all of their toys.
